pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert European Regional Data // Motivated by changing administrative boundaries over time, the 'nuts' package can convert European regional data with NUTS codes between versions (2006, 2010, 2013, 2016 and 2021) and levels (NUTS 1, NUTS 2 and NUTS 3). The package uses spatial interpolation as in Lam (1983) doi:10.1559/152304083783914958 based on granular (100m x 100m) area, population and land use data provided by the European Commission's Joint Research Center.
